text: Girl Drying Herself is a pastel by Edgar Degas. It is signed and dated 1885. It measures 80.1 x 51.2 cm (31 9/16 x 20 3/16 in.) It hangs in the National Gallery of Art, Washington DC. Category:1885 paintings Category:Paintings in the National Gallery of Art, Washington DC
title: Girl Drying Herself
